Thanks for HIMYM, always the best 20-40

HI twentyforty!! BIG fan of your work

could you please restrict the size of tv show packs (to lets say packs/parts of 700 mb)?
problem with big downloads is that lesser number of ppl seed and it takes forever to dowload to be able to seed.

Hey man, I know you probably dont like questions like this, but just wondered why you dropped caprica and event? Not enough interest?

Id also like to say, I love you torrents. Not only are they downloadable with a slow connection (thanks heaps for that!), but youve often got the shows I like, sci-fi and mystery stuffz. You got good taste. So thanks man for all the good workz :)
@fourpointfivehertz: I watch The Event but it hasn't been aired this week. Caprica was canceled last week, remaining episodes would be aired in 2011.
Any chance you could do Weeds S06E11 and up for iPod Touch?  I can't find it anywhere!  It would be much appreciated!
